price: 21. Y no sean como quienes dicen: “Escuchamos”, pero en verdad no escuchan.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna qālū samiʿ'nā wahum lā yasmaʿūna
